title: Johnson & Johnson Teams Up with Naomi Watts to Reveal Why an Eye Exam is the Ultimate Self-Care Move for Women Over 40
description: New survey reveals Americans overlook eye health—despite its impact on confidence, independence and early disease detection.
content: JACKSONVILLE, FL, December 3, 2025 Johnson & Johnson, a global leader in eye health, has partnered with Academy Awardnominated actress, producer, and entrepreneur, Naomi Watts, to change the conv… [+9138 chars]
